name: WannaCry Ransomware
description: A global ransomware attack that infected over 200,000 computers in 150 countries within hours.

timeline.details: WannaCry ransomware begins spreading globally, infecting over 200,000 computers in 150 countries within hours.
Security researcher Marcus Hutchins discovers a kill switch in the malware, slowing its spread significantly.
U.S. and U.K. governments attribute the attack to North Korean hackers, specifically the Lazarus Group.

impact: Affected hospitals, businesses, and government agencies worldwide, causing billions in damages.

name: Equifax Data Breach
description: One of the largest data breaches in history, exposing personal information of 147 million people.

timeline.details: Attackers exploit a vulnerability in Apache Struts framework to gain access to Equifax systems.
Equifax discovers the breach and begins investigation.
Equifax publicly announces the breach, affecting 147 million consumers.

impact: Exposed Social Security numbers, birth dates, addresses, and credit card information of millions.

name: SolarWinds Attack
description: A sophisticated supply chain attack that compromised thousands of organizations including government agencies.

timeline.details: Attackers inject malicious code into SolarWinds Orion software updates.
FireEye discovers the attack and notifies SolarWinds and government agencies.
U.S. government attributes the attack to Russian state-sponsored hackers.

impact: Compromised 18,000+ organizations including U.S. government agencies and Fortune 500 companies.
